The goal was to replicate the dynamics of a development team, focusing on code reviews, problem-solving, and integrating code with fellow team members.This project helped strengthen my skills in collaborative coding, version control, and agile practices, essential for working in a real-world development team. This project highlights my ability to create engaging front-end solutions with a focus on dynamic interactions and responsive design.
